description: This file defines a React functional component named TaskList, which renders a list of TaskItem components based on an array of tasks passed via props. It also handles events for toggling, deleting, and editing tasks.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onDelete, onEdit })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of TaskItem components based on tasks props.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onDelete, onEdit }) {$/
